meanings.definition: A larval stage of certain tapeworms, characterized by a solid body with a scolex at one end and a long, segmented body.
meanings.sent1: The plerocercoids were carefully studied under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen discovered plerocercoids in the fish they caught.
meanings.sent3: The plerocercoids decided to have a race to see who could reach the scolex first.
meanings.sent4: The plerocercoids in the fish were like hidden treasures waiting to be found.
meanings.sent5: The plerocercoids wriggled and squirmed, trying to escape their fate.

meanings.definition: The intermediate stage in the life cycle of certain tapeworms, typically found in the muscles of fish.
meanings.sent1: Scientists observed the plerocercoids closely to understand their development.
meanings.sent2: The plerocercoids in the fish were ready to move on to the next stage of their life cycle.
meanings.sent3: The plerocercoids threw a party in the fish muscles to celebrate their intermediate status.
meanings.sent4: The plerocercoids were like travelers passing through the fish's muscle highways.
meanings.sent5: The plerocercoids transformed the fish muscles into a bustling city of activity.
